name: Buffy the Champ Spire Slayer
description:
Take your game to the next level. As you complete the challenges and scale the tower your abilities scale with you. See if you can make it to the top.

This game was created by

Snugglebus/Justin Ray (@justinaray)

RadioUhOh/Mathieu Chamberland
